name: Bubble Blower (SRWGShinyo, LeRoitonLaveur)
description:
---------------------------------- PRESENTATION ----------------------

Defend your garden against terrible roaches ! Inflate your bubbles by alternating between the two keys on the left screen, and move on the proper lane to kill them with the two keys on the right !

But be careful...your breathe is limited ! Handle it well !

---------------------------------- INFORMATION -----------------------

This game was made in 48h for the Mini Jam 82 ! We hope you enjoy it !

We wanted to give it a very 'old' look, like an old PC or Atari Game !!

Programming : Yohann Degli Esposti
Art and Design : Florian Ortega

Music : The Grand Affaire - Coupe | Kevin McLeod - Itty Bitty 8 bit
